entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [regression/7.0.96] [Windows] Uneven rows in vertical CollectionView do not resize when item content size changes #18078
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #18072
  • New Bug in .NET 8: Windows and Android no longer draw Borders/clipping correctly (previously was okay) #18071
  • Visual Studio freezes with "Loading document..." message after saving XAML file #18069
  • Right grid padding seems to be doubled on smaller screen size in iOS #18067

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] .NET 8 RC1 cannot use Syncfusion controls - SfListView gives System.TypeLoadException #17265
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Entire page glitches when using Shell #17157
    .NET 8 GA
  • iPad physical device won't open any maui app. (Maui Net8 P7) #17268
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/7.0.59] Can't set MAUI iOS Navigation Icon after updating to 17.6 Preview 1 #13914
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [MAUI]Updating both NuGet packages to nightly, build fails with error CS0246 #18074
  • iOS Border crops/masks underlying elements wrong with clearly abnormal visual effect (iOS only) - repro project included #17998

PullRequests

Created

  • Setup legacy mappers #18087
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Update CoherentParentDependency #18085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2045.28 to 1.0.2088.41 #18084
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #18080
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Revert "Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time" #18077
    area/templates 📄
  • Force ShapeHandler to exist when adding shape to border #18076
    area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Support finding nearest TFM to collect assets from #18068
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18066
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8 GA #18061
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Update packages for rtm #17980
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17986
    .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • Try and detect the reason for the failures #17995
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added orientation property to slider #18057
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • [X] revert #5611 #17733
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix issue using Connectivity from a background thread #17903
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17956
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • [X] connect the right method to the event handler #18043
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Keep textcolor on characterspacing #17926
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
